title: Land Sale in Welivita, Kaduwela
details:
10.5 Square Land @ Welivita Kaduwela
-20ft Wide Road and Just 10 meters for Main Road
-Good opportunity for build Residence living home
-Electricity & water supply
-Covered by walls and Gate
-Calm & Quiet residential area

-4km to Kaduwela,,, 12.5km to Fort,, 2km to Nevil Fernando Hospital
-Close to Cargills and Essential Shopping Malls

Per Perch.....Rs 699,999
Total Value.. Rs 7,349,999

Price can be Negotiable.
QUICK SALE and URGENT
Free to Call Genuine Buyers Only
